metadata.synopsis: A cinematic, showing the second scrying screens on the wall of the security office in the Steel Watch Foundry. The camera should zoom in on the screen, and help convey the information.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to -325; 10; -147 and click on the S_LOW_ScryScreen02_1d221b28-9a9b-482a-9ef0-4e65a0e60bc7

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Scared and miserable with visible cuts and bruises, these people can only be one thing - prisoners.*
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: |A group of scared looking people huddle together against a cold prison wall, that they are clearly chained to. The seem dirty, exhausted and miserable.|
